extension_description.message: Tweak your favorite web pages on the fly! Also a perfect customizable AdBlocker.

page_action_title.message: Modified by PersonalizedWeb. Click to reload with no modifications.

options_title.description: Title of the extension's options page.

link_regexp_docs.description: Title of the link to a manual on RegExp.

link_forum.description: Title of the link to a discussion forum (Google Groups).

link_gallery.description: Title of the link to a gallery page.

logo_tooltip.message: Drag this image to the bookmarks bar
logo_tooltip.description: Tooltip text for the logo image on the Options page.

rule_enabler_tooltip.description: Tooltip text for a check box that enables/disables a PWeb rule.

popup_menu_link.description: Link to open a popup menu for PWeb rules and/or filters.

regexp_input_tooltip.description: Tooltip text on input fields that are to accept a regular expression.

text_input_tooltip.description: Tooltip text on input fields that are to accept a (comma separated) text value.

rule_name_label.description: Text label preceding rules' Name input field.

match_urls_label.description: Text label preceding rules' Match URLs input field.

exclude_urls_label.description: Text label preceding rules' Exclude URLs input field.

intercept_doc_write_label.message: Try to prevent web pages from injecting iframe, object, embed and script DOM nodes via JavaScript's document.write() calls.
intercept_doc_write_label.description: Text label for the option to intercept document.write() calls.

intercept_doc_write_tooltip.message: This will not only remove some ads, but also will decrease page load time!
intercept_doc_write_tooltip.description: Tooltip text for the option to intercept document.write() calls.

removers_label.description: Text label preceding Remover rules block.

remover_tags_label.description: Text label preceding Remover rules' Tags input field.

remover_attr_label.description: Text label preceding Remover rules' Attribute input field.

remover_value_label.description: Text label preceding Remover rules' Value input field.

add_new_remover.description: Button's label to add a new Remover rule.

add_css_label.description: Text label preceding rules' Add CSS input field.

add_html_label.description: Text label preceding rules' Add HTML input field.

add_html_help.message: <script> tags executed in the context of the web page
add_html_help.description: Help text displayed under the "Add HTML" input field.

add_js_label.description: Text label preceding rules' Add JavaScript input field.

add_js_help.message: Executed in the context of the $link_start$content script$link_end$
add_js_help.description: Help text displayed under the "Add JavaScript" input field.

add_new_rule.description: Button's label to add a new Rule.

load_dumped_rules.description: Button's label to load previously dumped rules.

dump_all_rules.description: Button's label to dump all rules.

save_rules.description: Button's label to save all rules.

menu_move_up.description: Menu option to move a rule/filter up.

menu_move_down.description: Menu option to move a rule/filter down.

menu_dump.description: Menu option to dump a rule.

menu_clone.description: Menu option to clone a rule/filter.

menu_delete.description: Menu option to delete a rule/filter.

open_new_tabs_label.message: Open new tabs next to the right of the current one
open_new_tabs_label.description: Text label preceding a corresponding checkbox.

show_icon_label.message: Show icon in the address bar for modified web pages
show_icon_label.description: Text label preceding a corresponding checkbox.

should_save_changes.message: You should save the changes first. Save changes?
should_save_changes.description: A message that is should to the user when the changes should be saved first before performing an action.

save_changes.description: A message to ask the user whether to save the changes or not.

discard_changes.message: You have unsaved changes. Discard the changes?
discard_changes.description: A message to ask the user whether to discard the changes or not.

enter_dump_prompt.description: A message to prompt the user to enter previously dumped rules.

rule_name_noname.description: Placeholder for an unnamed (newly created) rule.

error_empty_match_regex.message: Error: Empty "Match URLs" RegExp in rule "$rule_name$". The rule will be ignored.
error_empty_match_regex.description: Error message for an empty regular expression.

error_invalid_match_regex.message: Error: Invalid "Match URLs" RegExp in rule "$rule_name$"
error_invalid_match_regex.description: Error message for the match URLs invalid regular expression. Put no dot at the end.

error_invalid_exclude_regex.message: Error: Invalid "Exclude URLs" RegExp in rule "$rule_name$"
error_invalid_exclude_regex.description: Error message for the exclude URLs invalid regular expression. Put no dot at the end.

error_invalid_remover_regex.message: Error: Invalid RegExp in rule "$rule_name$", remover #$remover_no$
error_invalid_remover_regex.description: Error message for the exclude URLs invalid regular expression. Put no dot at the end.

error_json_parse.description: Error message to alert the user for an invalid JSON.
